title: Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif arrives in Quetta
content:
QUETTA, Apr 23 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Saturday arrived in Quetta for a day-long visit to Balochistan, his first visit after being sworn in as the 23rd PM of Pakistan.
On his arrival, the prime minister was received by Balochistan Chief Minister Abdul Quddus Bizinjo while acting Governor Balochistan Mir Jan Mohammad Khan Jamali, Federal minister for Housing and Works Maulana Abdul Wasey, Chief Secretary Balochistan and Inspector General of Balochistan Police were also present.
Federal Planning Minister Ahsan Iqbal and JUI leader Asad Mehmood accompanied the prime minister.
